executable.title: Synthetic image generation
executable.description: This module is used to make synthetic test images for experimentation and debugging.
executable.contributor: Please direct questions or suggestions to http://groups.google.com/group/plastimatch

boolean.name: enable_stage_0
boolean.label: Enable Stage 0?
boolean.description: Check this box if you want to run initial translation, rigid, or affine registration

integer-vector.name: stage_0_resolution
integer-vector.label: Image Subsampling rate (vox)
integer-vector.description: This defines the image subsampling rate. For example, (4,4,2) would subsample a 4x4x2 voxel block down to a single voxel.

string-enumeration.name: stage_0_xform
string-enumeration.description: Transformation: T = translation, R = rigid, A = affine
string-enumeration.label: Transformation
